author: newsr.in
title: Bradley Cooper Reacts to Jennifer Lawrence's Wage Inequality Op-Ed Piece
text: Bradley Cooper is sharing his thoughts on the op-ed piece that Jennifer Lawrence wrote about wage inequality in Hollywood. The 40-year-old actor, who is mentioned in the piece, did not read the open letter before the interview took place, but he still shared his thoughts on the topic. “One thing I could say is that’s [...] »
